price: 59 A leur retour, ils dirent : « Quel est le criminel qui a osé traiter ainsi nos divinités ? »
arabic: قَالُواْ مَن فَعَلَ هَٰذَا بِـَٔالِهَتِنَآ إِنَّهُۥ لَمِنَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: qālū man faʿala hādhā biālihatinā innahu lamina al-ẓālimīna
